name: 3. Execute Procedure
payload: [["I am sent from an inject node",444],["then rendered in the static parameter",555]]

name: Read me - using TVP (Static query and param type set in the MSSQL node, param / Dynamic param value)
Read me - setup SQL Connection
info:
1. Open the MSSQL node
2. Click the [pencil] icon to edit the connection
3. Enter your servers host name (or IP), username, password, database name
4. Click Done, Done
5. cycle through the 4 numbered Inject nodes.

name: create TYPE
template: CREATE TYPE TestType AS TABLE ( a VARCHAR(50), b INT );

name: drop TYPE and PROCEDURE
template:
DROP PROCEDURE MyCustomStoredProcedure;

DROP TYPE TestType;

name: create PROCEDURE
template: CREATE PROCEDURE MyCustomStoredProcedure (@tvp TestType readonly) AS SELECT * FROM @tvp;

name: Read me - Setup
info:
1 - create the type in the database
2 - create the procedure in the database
4 - drop the procedure and type from the database

name: create table for 'tvp' param
Read me - using TVP (Fully Dynamic (MSSQL node has nothing set other than the connection))
info:
Using the example sql type and procedure [here](https://tediousjs.github.io/node-mssql/#table-valued-parameter-tvp), you would need data in the value to be in the following format...
```json
{
    "columns": [
        {
            "name": "a",
            "type": "VarChar(50)"
        },
        {
            "name": "b",
            "type": "Int"
        }
    ],
    "rows": [
        [ "hello tvp", 777 ],
        [ "bye tvp", 888 ],
        [ "call the cops", 999 ]
    ]
}
```

The inject node provides the raw data values in the form of an array of rows (which are arrays os value) e.g...
```
[ 
  [val1, val2], //row 1
  [val1, val2], //row 2
]
```

In the function node, we add more values for the MSSQL node...
* `msg.payload` is set to the name of the stored procedure
* `msg.queryMode` is set to 'execute' (so that the stored procedure node is used)
* `msg.queryParams` is set to an array of parameter objects

name: 3. Execute Procedure
payload: [["I am just an array value...",777],["I was sent in from an inject node",888],["but I could come from anywhere",999]]

name: dynamic query, table and params

params.name: tvp
params.value: {"columns":[{"name":"a","type":"VarChar(50)"},{"name":"b","type":"Int"}],"rows":[["i am hard coded in MSSQL Node",111],["me too too too",222],["me three three three",333]]}

name: Read me - using TVP (Static setup of query, param and param value in the MSSQL node)
